name: breakpoint-file-sync
description: Automatically synchronizes breakpoints with specified files

breakpointFileSync.files.description: Specifies the files to synchronize breakpoints with.

kind.description: Describes the type of serialization to use.

matchingPath.description: A regular expression that matches the paths of source files that should be included in the file.

name.description: The name of the file. If not absolute, will be relative to the workspace folder.

filePrefix.description: A string to prepend before any breakpoint entries to the generated file.

format.description: The format of the breakpoint entries. If an array, all of its entries will be joined with a new-line character. Available variables: $path, $absPath, $filename, $line, $condition, $hitCount.

fileSuffix.description: A string to append after all breakpoint entries to the generated file.

endWithNewLine.description: If 'true', all breakpoint entries will end with a new-line character (\n).

skipDisabled.description: If 'true', disabled breakpoints will not be included.

undefinedPlaceholder.description: If a given variable is not available (e.g. not provided), but is referenced in the 'format' field, this value will be used as a placeholder.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
